dcterms:description: The PAZ satellite mission is utilized for Earth surveillance, specifically for detecting vessels engaged in unauthorized activities.
dcterms:title: PAZ satellite mission

dcterms:creator: G. Cui
X. Li
L. Xu
W. Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset involves an offloading strategy developed for tasks generated in IoT terrestrial devices, focusing on optimizing communication and computation resources to reduce latency and power consumption.
dcterms:title: IoT terrestrial devices

dcterms:creator: Q. Tang
Z. Fei
B. Li
Z. Han
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on computation offloading in LEO satellite networks that utilize hybrid cloud and edge computing, aiming to minimize energy consumption while meeting coverage time constraints.
dcterms:title: LEO satellite networks with hybrid cloud and edge computing

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
J. Zhang
X. Zhang
P. Wang
L. Liu
dcterms:description: This dataset presents an energy consumption model for processing tasks in satellite terrestrial networks, particularly focusing on a computation offloading strategy that incorporates double edge computing.
dcterms:title: Energy consumption model for processing tasks

dcterms:description: This dataset provides information on ground network services that support satellite communications.
dcterms:title: Ground network services

dcterms:description: This dataset outlines the Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB-S2) standard, which includes specifications for framing structure, channel coding, and modulation systems for satellite applications.
dcterms:title: Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB-S2)

dcterms:creator: K. N. R. Rao
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive overview of satellite communications concepts and applications, serving as a foundational resource for understanding satellite technology.
dcterms:title: Satellite communications concepts and applications
